job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate.
     * Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
     * Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency.
job_details.full_text:
Data software engineer

* Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate.
     * Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
     * Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering and traditional software development tasks related to streaming and real-time data processing. There is no mention of machine learning, generative AI, or specific AI modeling techniques, which are central to the ML Engineer and GenAI Engineer profiles.

phrases: Redesign and optimize our Kafka streaming components to reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate.
Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases describe the core activities of building, optimizing, and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure, specifically involving streaming technologies like Kafka and enabling real-time data processing.

phrases: Upgrading/Developing new components of a multilayered application to enable near real-time data processing.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the development of application components, which falls under traditional software engineering, even though it's for data processing.

phrases: Monitor, maintain and debug all components daily to ensure stability and consistency.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the operational aspects of ensuring the reliability and stability of deployed components, which aligns with the principles of operations engineering, though not specifically MLOps in an AI context.

phrases: reduce latency, increase throughput, and increase event consumption rate
soft_skills.justification: These phrases imply a need to analyze performance issues and implement practical solutions to improve system efficiency and reliability.
